Html:
Hi all,

How is it going? I would like to generate a report to show transaction record on excel spread sheet.

Currently on the form itself, it's showing the record of transaction by using smarty with html on smarty template.

so if user clicks on extract report button then it should be generating a report on excel sheet.

Please help me out here.

Terry
